commands.name: Mute a video
commands.description: Removes the audio track of a video without transcoding.

commands.name: Re-encode video as H.264
commands.description: Converts any input video to H.264 format. Audio is preserved.

commands.name: Change volume of an audio file by scale
commands.description: Change the volume of an audio file to a scale of the current volune.

commands.name: Change volume of an audio file by decibels
commands.description: Change the volume of an audio file by decibels.

commands.name: Normalize loudness of an audio file
commands.description: Normalize the perceived loudness of a file using he EBU R128 algorithm.

commands.name: Crop a video
commands.description: Crops a video to a specific area.

commands.name: Change a video playback speed
commands.description: Change the speed a video is played (faster).
